snippet: It was the final report that was supposed to bring closure to this small town after an explosive train derailment claimed 47 lives and ignited a North American debate on the transport of crude by rail....

headline.print_headline: Rail Safety Must Be Priority After Lac-Mégantic Disaster: Mayor
headline.main: Rail Safety Must Be Priority After Lac-Mégantic Disaster: Mayor

lead_paragraph: It was the final report that was supposed to bring closure to this small town after an explosive train derailment claimed 47 lives and ignited a North American debate on the transport of crude by rail.
